## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [asTriples](./rstream-query.astriples.md) | Converts given object into an iterable of triples, with the following conversion rules:<!-- -->- Toplevel object keys are used as subjects and MUST each have a plain object as value, where its keys are used as predicates and values as objects (in the SPO sense). - Plain objects in SPO object position are translated into unique IDs in order to allow the nested map to become a subject itself. In RDF terms, this is equivalent to BNodes. - Arrays in SPO object position cause multiple triples with same subject &amp; predicate to be emitted. If any of the items in the array is a plain object, it will be treated as BNode and transformed as described in the previous rule |
|  [autoQVar](./rstream-query.autoqvar.md) |  |
|  [isAutoQVar](./rstream-query.isautoqvar.md) |  |
|  [isQVar](./rstream-query.isqvar.md) |  |
|  [LOGGER](./rstream-query.logger.md) |  |
|  [patternVarCount](./rstream-query.patternvarcount.md) |  |
|  [patternVars](./rstream-query.patternvars.md) |  |
|  [qvarName](./rstream-query.qvarname.md) |  |
|  [qvarResolver](./rstream-query.qvarresolver.md) | Returns an optimized query variable solution extractor function based on given pattern type. <code>vs</code>, <code>vp</code>, <code>vo</code> are flags to indicate if <code>s</code>, <code>p</code> and/or <code>o</code> pattern items are query variables. The returned fn will be optimized to 1 of the 8 possible case and accepts a single fact to extract the respective variables from. |
|  [resolvePathPattern](./rstream-query.resolvepathpattern.md) | Takes a path triple pattern and max depth. The pattern's predicate must be a seq of preds. Returns a 2-elem vector \[patterns vars\], where <code>patterns</code> is a list of generated sub-query patterns with injected temp qvars for in between patterns and <code>vars</code> are the temp qvars themselves.<!-- -->Example:
```
["?s", [p1, p2, p3], "?o"] =>
[
  [["?s", p1, "?__q0"], ["?__q0", p2, "?__q1"], ["?__q1", p3, "?o"] ],
  ["?__q0", "?__q1"]
]

```
 |
|  [setLogger](./rstream-query.setlogger.md) |  |
|  [sortPatterns](./rstream-query.sortpatterns.md) |  |
